entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bonaventure
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
